snippet: Little, Brown & Company is expected to announce Monday that Elton John has signed up to write his first book, about his experience in fighting AIDS.
abstract: Publishers Little, Brown & Company is expected to announce that Elton John has signed up to write his first book, titled Love Is the Cure, about his experience in fighting AIDS.

byline.original: By JULIE BOSMAN; Compiled by ADAM W. KEPLER

lead_paragraph: Little, Brown & Company is expected to announce Monday that Elton John has signed up to write his first book, about his experience in fighting AIDS.

headline.main: Publisher Has Deal for Elton John Book
headline.print_headline: Publisher Has Deal For Elton John Book
